item.description:
Not in the Christmas Spirit yet? Need a little Holiday Cheer? Well come on out to Haverhill and join us for the Christmas Stroll and Penquin Pub Crawl. Although the events begin at 5pm, we will meet at 6pm in front of The Tap on Washington Street.

We will be walking around downtown Haverhill, taking in the Christmas Stroll and if everyone is game go into a few of the pubs to check out the Penquin Pub Crawl.

The below is the Chambers write up about the events:


The Greater Haverhill Chamber of Commerce in partnership with Pentucket Medical Associates, Trinity EMS, and Covanta is proud to present the 18th Annual Downtown Christmas Stroll on Friday December 3, 2010 from 5pm-8pm. The annual Christmas Stroll in Haverhill was started 18 years ago and has been an enduring downtown tradition bringing local families together to celebrate with music, shopping, lighting of the City’s holiday tree, activities for Children, a visit from Santa and more! This free to the public event brings nearly 3000 people to Haverhill’s downtown.

Also on Friday, December 3 from 5-9PM there will be the 2nd Annual Downtown Penguin Pub Crawl- back by Popular Demand!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Donna & Janet in front of the pub
item.name: Christmas Stroll & Penquin Pub Crawl in Haverhill
